trans-unit.source: Provides multi-targeting for Windows Workflow Designer hosts.
trans-unit.target: 針對 Windows Workflow Designer 主機提供多目標功能。

trans-unit.source: *Multi-targeting* is the ability to find the right version of the loaded assembly that corresponds to the target [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] version of the current workflow project in [!INCLUDE[vs2010](~/includes/vs2010-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: *多目標*是能力，找出正確的版本，載入的組件會對應至目標[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]中目前的工作流程專案的版本[!INCLUDE[vs2010](~/includes/vs2010-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: This interface is implemented and used internally by [!INCLUDE[wf1](~/includes/wf1-md.md)] designer components to resolve [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] assemblies in a multi-targeting aware fashion within the [!INCLUDE[vs2010](~/includes/vs2010-md.md)] hosting application.
trans-unit.target: 此介面是由 [!INCLUDE[wf1](~/includes/wf1-md.md)] 設計工具元件在內部實作與使用，以便在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 裝載的應用程式中，以多目標的方式解析 [!INCLUDE[vs2010](~/includes/vs2010-md.md)] 組件。

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[wf1](~/includes/wf1-md.md)] designer components use the implementation of this interface only when additional assemblies need to be loaded dynamically into the editing `AppDomain`.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[wf1](~/includes/wf1-md.md)]設計工具元件會使用這個介面的實作，只有當其他組件需要以動態方式載入的編輯時`AppDomain`。

trans-unit.source: Returns the currently loaded assembly given the assembly name.
trans-unit.target: 假設有組件名稱，傳回目前載入的組件。

trans-unit.source: The currently loaded assembly given the assembly name.
trans-unit.target: 假設有組件名稱，則為目前載入的組件。

trans-unit.source: The type to get the runtime type of.
trans-unit.target: 要取得其執行階段類型的類型。

trans-unit.source: Gets the runtime type that corresponds to the specified type.
trans-unit.target: 取得對應到指定之類型的執行階段類型。

trans-unit.source: The runtime type that corresponds to the specified type.
trans-unit.target: 對應到指定之類型的執行階段類型。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the specified type is supported.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，這個值會指出是否支援指定的類型。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified type is supported; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果支援指定的型別，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。
